GUYS

They are NOT "eating" the fish. They are lapping the salts and minerals, and other nutrients off of it's body.

Males do this to increase their chances of reproduction by incorporating it into their sperm.

Butterflies are HARMLESS.
They don't have teeth, claws, or stingers.
They have to get their sodium too.
Do you know that deer also eat meat? Meat is far easier to digest than plant material, so if the need arises the deer can simply consume meat.
At least the fish didn’t eat the butterflies.

@destinws2 Yea. I think this occurred on a small island off of the coast of the UK. Deer that lived on this island did not receive enough nutrients and minerals from their normal roughage as the soil is quite deficient in trace elements. So the deer ate the wings and legs off of petrel chicks to supplement their diet. Unfortunately they didn't eat the rest of the chick and so they were probably left to die on their own accord. Sorry for the hazy details, but I can't remember where I read it
